mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vi_company_apply (member_no, recruit_no, resume_no, introduction_no, state) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{recruitNo}, #{resumeNo}, #{introductionNo}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vi_company_apply WHERE comapply_no = #{comapplyNo} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM vi_company_apply WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} AND recruit_no = #{recruitNo} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM vi_company_apply WHERE member_no = #{accountNo} ORDER BY comapply_no ASC LIMIT 0, #{lastCount}

SELECT main.*, sub2.id AS member_id, sub3.title AS recruit_title, sub4.title AS resume_name, sub5.introduction_title AS introduction_name FROM vi_company_apply AS main, (SELECT recruit_no FROM vi_recruit_write WHERE company_no = #{accountNo}) AS sub1, (SELECT at1.id, bt2.member_no FROM vi_account as at1 INNER JOIN vi_member as bt2 ON bt2.account_no = at1.account_no) AS sub2, (SELECT * FROM vi_recruit_write) AS sub3, (SELECT * FROM vi_resume) AS sub4, (SELECT * FROM vi_introduction) AS sub5 WHERE sub1.recruit_no = main.recruit_no AND sub3.recruit_no = main.recruit_no AND sub4.resume_no = main.resume_no AND main.introduction_no = sub5.introduction_no AND sub2.member_no = main.member_no ORDER BY comapply_no ASC LIMIT 0, #{lastCount}
